text: In Hinduism, the Goddess Tara (Sanskrit: Tārā, Devanagari: तारा) meaning "star" is the second of the ten Mahavidyas or "Great Wisdom(Goddesse)s", Tantric manifestations of Mahadevi, Kali or Parvati. Category:Hindu gods and goddesses Category:Hinduism Category:Hindu goddesses Category:Mahavidyas
title: Tara (Mahavidya)
